    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_0362772713999d3dce1ff3b97214b73c7bce552a</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Purification of rock salt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reinigung des Felsensalzes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Purification de sel de roche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Purification do sal da rocha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Purificazione del sale della roccia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθαρισμός του άλατος βράχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Purificación de la sal de la roca</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is the fourth of four illustrations showing the steps to purify rock salt. The salt solution is placed in an evaporating dish and heated over a beaker of hot water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evaporating dish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">purification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rock salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salt solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist das Viertel von vier Abbildungen, 
welche die Jobsteps zeigen, um Felsensalz zu reinigen. Die 
Salzlösung wird in ein Abdampfgefäß gelegt und erhitzt über einem 
Becher Heißwasser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est le quart de quatre illustrations montrant 
les étapes pour épurer le sel de roche. La solution de sel est
placée dans une capsule d'évaporation et chauffée au-dessus d'un 
becher d'eau chaude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é o fourth de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram as etapas para purify o sal da rocha. A solução de sal
é colocada em um prato evaporando e aquecida sobre uma taça da água
quente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è il quarto di quattro illustrazioni 
che mostrano i punti per purificare il sale della roccia. La 
soluzione salina è disposta in una capsula d'evaporazione ed è 
riscaldata sopra una coppa di acqua calda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι το τέταρτο τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν τα βήματα για να καθαρίσει το άλας βράχου. Η 
αλατισμένη λύση τοποθετείται σε ένα εξατμίζοντας πιάτο και 
θερμαίνεται πέρα από μια κούπα του καυτού ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es el cuarto de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran los pasos de progresión para purificar la sal de la roca. 
La solución de sal se pone en una cápsula de evaporación y se
calienta sobre un cubilete de agua caliente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abdampfgefäß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heißwasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reinigung</string>
          </keyword>
